meta.job_title: Home Health Director of Clinical and Operations Solutions

duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the collaborative process between members of the Interdisciplinary Team (IDT).
Ensure home health services are available 24/7.
Follow state regulatory requirements for supervision of nursing services.
Serve as agency Administrator as appointed.
Manage all members of the IDT, including scheduling, productivity, mentoring, pay practices, and performance reviews.
Document in the patient’s clinical record when required and demonstrate proficiency with documentation requirements.
Collaborate regarding QAPI activities, Performance Improvement, and quality metrics including HHCAHPS and Home Health Quality outcomes.
Participate in care delivery for patients including admissions, recertification visits, routine visits, and discharge visits.
Manage the care for a caseload of patients to support ebb and flow of census changes.
Participate in after-hours shifts and serve as the administrator on call when scheduled.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree strongly preferred but not required. Registered Nurse or Physical Therapist with an active, unencumbered license. COMPACT license is preferred. Minimum of 5 years of nursing experience, 3 years in home health required. Minimum of 5 years of management experience, 2 years in hospice or home care required. Proficient in the use and function of Homecare Homebase EMR for Hospice or Home Health – experience must be in the past 12 months. Experience in a regional role in hospice or home care is preferred but not required. Math and Language Skills required. Willing to become licensed as a registered nurse or physical therapist in all states with a Compassus program location. A valid driver’s license is required.
